May 27, 1901 D Berkhamsted Contest
Berkhamsted Contest 0 Test Piece Contest
berkhamsted-contest
Own Choice from a Specified List
Castle Grounds, Berkhamsted Choice of test piece: "Songs of Scotland", "Crispino" or "Lurline" Prizes: £8, £4, £2, £1 Medal to best cornet soloist - presented by J.H. Iles 2 bands competed.
March 4, 2017, 12:17 p.m. June 20, 2018, 10:23 p.m.
1 John Dickinson (Apsley) Band Unknown Crispino [arr. Round]
2 2nd Batt Berkshire Regt Unknown Lurline [unknown arranger]
